answers.answer: *No loss of mucus plug to say
I was due then too..found out today my lil one is breech so c section is tomorrow..Lil sad but happy to see him soon!
Aww, good luck an congrats! Last I checked baby girl head was already down and low I just don't know.
I was due on the 4th as well, having Csection later today because I'm showing No signs of progression and have gestational diabetes so let's get this little man outta here safely.
I'm due tomorrow and have been 1 1/2 dialated since last week with no change. No mucus plug no contractions dome pressure but other than that nothing
I was due on the first but no sign of labor at all I've been dilated to 2cm since I was first checked at 39 weeks. I don't think my lil girl will be here until they make her.

question: 3Days left so to speak, and can I say no contractions here, no mucus plug, no pain at all, baby moving great, no water leakage dilated a little bit, I guess baby girl is very comfortable in we're she's at if she would only know how bad mommy wants her here. Aye the things!
title: April 4th
